info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 7:08PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Fulton and northwestern Saratoga Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 708 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cranberry Creek, or 10 miles northeast of Gloversville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, half inch hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roads and in urban or poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Broadalbin, Edinburg, Northville, Cranberry Creek, Day Center, Northampton Beach Public Campground, Mount Pleasant, Fairchilds Corners, Fish House, Sweets Crossing, Benedict, Shaw Corners, Steele Corners, Barkersville, Glenwild, Wiley Corners, Long Corners, Carpenters Corners, East Galway and Osbourne Bridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
